content:
DataAnnotationsModelValidationFactory Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that creates a DataAnnotationsModelValidatorProvider instance.

In this Article

public delegate System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelValidator DataAnnotationsModelValidationFactory(ModelMetadata metadata, ModelBindingExecutionContext context, ValidationAttribute attribute);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
DataAnnotationsModelValidationFactory
